amendment.description: To designate any portion of the County of Honolulu as a rural area or eligible rural community.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2099 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2099 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S14007; text: CR S14007) To designate any portion of the County of Honolulu as a rural area or eligible rural community.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2099 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2099 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Inouye.
